mapper.insert:
insert into zy-community.zy_visitor(community_id, visitor_name, visitor_phone_number, visitor_date, create_by_id, create_by_open_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.communityId}, #{entity.visitorName}, #{entity.visitorPhoneNumber}, #{entity.visitorDate}, #{entity.createById}, #{entity.createByOpenId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})

insert into zy-community.zy_visitor(community_id, visitor_name, visitor_phone_number, visitor_date, create_by_id, create_by_open_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values
(#{entity.communityId}, #{entity.visitorName}, #{entity.visitorPhoneNumber}, #{entity.visitorDate}, #{entity.createById}, #{entity.createByOpenId}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remark})
on duplicate key update community_id = values(community_id) , visitor_name = values(visitor_name) , visitor_phone_number = values(visitor_phone_number) , visitor_date = values(visitor_date) , create_by_id = values(create_by_id) , create_by_open_id = values(create_by_open_id) , create_by = values(create_by) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_by = values(update_by) , update_time = values(update_time) , remark = values(remark)
